member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC
member.summary: Describes stencil operations that can be performed based on the results of stencil test.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilFailOp
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilDepthFailOp
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilPassOp
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass.

member.name: D3D12_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilFunc
member.summary: A -typed value that identifies the function that compares stencil data against existing stencil data.
